page.title: 03GOVERNMENT,HEALTH.
page.content: { Our member of Parliament}is{ {Alistair Goodlad}(Conservative). Our County Council is the{Cheshire {County Council,}which deals with Education, Police, Fire, Countryside Rangers and Health Service etc..., while the {Vale Royal District Council deals with Refuse Collection,Local parks and Swimming Baths.The {Parish {Council}is responsible for Footpaths and all local problems. The only hospital in the area is { {Crossley Hospital}which is owned by { {Cheshire Health Authority}.It is not a General hospital,it is a{long stay {Geriatric Psychiatric Hospital,}it only has six wards. There is a{doctor's surgery}at the Cross in Kingsley,the doctor is not based there.People usually travel to the surgery in Frodsham.The nearest {dentist}is there also.
